Name: Media.Selector
Desc: Region selection tool for images and videos
LongDesc: The Media.Selector component creates an interactive region selection interface allowing users to draw, resize and move selection areas on top of media elements. It supports percentage-based coordinates, aspect ratio constraints, and programmatic control.
Example: var selector = Media.Selector('#image-container', {default: {x: 10, y: 10, w: 30, h: 30}});
